items.sentence: My father told me about his experiences during the war.
The army rejected Tom because of a physical disability.
The children exchanged presents at the Christmas party.
The last time I saw Tom he was headed toward the beach.
The last time I saw Tom he was wearing a hospital gown.
The men entered the warehouse with their weapons ready.
Tom finished off the ice cream that was in the freezer.
I could have someone find out that information for you.
Tom had several photos of Mary that John had given him.
Tom has already finished the work that he needed to do.
